fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Prototype Amber, Favonius Codex, Hakushin Ring

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge | <goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus | <circlet>  CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Stellaris Phantasm
**2)** Normal Attack: Ripple of Fate
**3)** Elemental Skill: Mirror Reflection of Doom

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Hakushin Ring should only be used in her taser teams (teams using electro characters). CRIT Rate is only considered when using Favonius Codex, and offensive stats can be ignored apart from Energy Recharge
